title: President Donald J. Trump Is Protecting the United States from Terrorism – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		National Security & Defense	

Issued on:
October 4, 2018
When it comes to terrorism, we will do whatever is necessary to protect our Nation.
						President Donald J. Trump					THE PATH TO VICTORY: President Donald J. Trump is releasing a new National Strategy for Counterterrorism that will protect American citizens and interests at home and abroad.A NEW APPROACH: The new strategy builds on lessons learned from past counterterrorism efforts and offers a new path toward strengthening the security of Americans.DEFEATING TERROR: Thanks to President Trump’s leadership, the United States has accelerated efforts to defeat terrorists and protect the United States from global threats.Read the National Strategy for Counterterrorism here.
